name: searxng
description: Search the web using SearXNG, a privacy-respecting metasearch engine. Returns JSON results with titles, URLs, and snippets. Requires SEARXNG_ENDPOINT environment variable to be set to your SearXNG instance hostname (e.g., 'search.example.com'). Results are limited to 50KB.
args: endpoint="${SEARXNG_ENDPOINT:-}"; if [ -z "$endpoint" ]; then echo '{"error":"SEARXNG_ENDPOINT environment variable is not set. Please set it to your SearXNG instance hostname (e.g., export SEARXNG_ENDPOINT=search.example.com)"}'; exit 1; fi; url="https://${endpoint}/search?q={{query}}&format=json"; [ -n "{{categories}}" ] && url="${url}&categories={{categories}}"; [ -n "{{time_range}}" ] && url="${url}&time_range={{time_range}}"; [ -n "{{language}}" ] && url="${url}&language={{language}}"; curl -s "$url" | head -c 50000

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string (URL-encoded spaces as + signs)

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Search category: general, news, images, videos, science, it, files, social+media, music, map

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: Time filter: day, week, month, year
